name: Gorebreaker
storyline:
Planet Xonader is the lifeblood of the intergalactic death industry. For thousands of years, its weapons have fuelled the galaxy’s most atrocious conflicts. Xonader's armaments are unlike any other tools of war – they are efficient "Thinking Weapons": semi-conscious organic and chemical elements that provide the wielder with both incredible firepower and augmented strategic awareness on the battlefield.

When a Xonadian starship was forced to carry out an emergency crash landing on a remote planet called Earth, its cargo of weapons were ejected from the ship's hull by the emergency system and were strewn across the planet. Although the ship’s vital sensors indicate that the starship's commander is still alive, he remains uncontactable.

Now, Xonader have dispatched a second ship with a new commander, Captain Plasma, and his loyal shipmate, Crystal Soldier. Their mission: to recover the weapons and shed light on what happened after the crash. However, what they will discover on Earth will disrupt the very fabric of their existence…
summary: Gorebreaker is the follow-up to Death Cargo.
